Session Desciption: Maximize the potential of your WCED Office 365 account (@wcgschools.gov.za) and discover how to enhance teaching, learning, and collaboration with its versatile tools and features.
Session Outcomes:
⮚  Understanding what the M365 platform entails 
⮚  Accessing your @wcgschools.gov.za account

Session Desciption: Discover Book Creator and learn how to craft engaging digital storybooks that inspire students!
Session Outcomes:
This workshop will be demonstrative and practical while it explores the following:
  
 Practical application of the Book Creator tool
 Set up book creator account 
 Work with text, images, audio, video, shapes
 Create, Publish and Share book
 Practical application after each section so that at the end of the session participant have created their first book

Session Desciption: Discover the power of Artificial Intelligence in education, exploring innovative ways to enhance lesson preparation and classroom teaching, and unlock new possibilities for student learning.
Session Outcomes:
This session will cover the following:
> Discussions about taking the "next step" with AI - beyond just preparing
> 3 examples of teaching techniques that could not be achieved without AI
1. AI for continual Formative Assessment
2. AI for adaptive storytelling (reading and comprehension)
3. AI for adaptive narrative (critical analysis of varied, adaptive texts)

Session Desciption: Enhance your digital presentation skills, from fundamentals to advanced techniques, in this engaging session designed for educators of all ICT proficiency levels, ensuring engaging and effective teaching.
Session Outcomes:
>  Cognitive Overload
How to ensure that our presentations have the maximum impact on learning by avoiding overloading presentations.

>>  Aesthetic value 
Understanding the balance of style and substance with presentations. How we can make things look good, but avoid our message being lost.

>>  Maximising screen real estate
Using as much of the screen for your presentations, whether working in PowerPoint, Word or PDFs

>>  Adding annotations on websites/desktop
How can we add annotations on our screens on any Window or on any Website.

Session Desciption: Uncover the transformative impact of AI on student learning. Discover how the use of AI can shift the focus from results to process and foster lifelong learning.
Session Outcomes:
> Understand the difference between being process-oriented and results-oriented.
> Understand how AI can be used to support learning and not only to complete tasks to achieve results.
> Understand the How, What, When principle of AI integration.
> Have a basic framework to promote healthy Digital Citizenship and Ethical Usage related to AI.

Session Desciption: ClassPoint transforms teaching into magical experiences! This add-on seamlessly integrates into PowerPoint, captivating students and enhancing PowerPoint's capabilities to keep them engaged and eager to learn.
Session Outcomes:
Spice up Your Presentations
> Master the art of Inking tools (Pen, highlighter, laser,etc)
> Switch up your presentation vibe with a whiteboard twist and funky backgrounds
> Jazz up your slides by dragging in cool objects
> Pop in text boxes like a pro
> Don't forget to save your masterpiece to the slide deck
> Get creative with shapes and other fun annotation tools

Engage Your Students
> Add some suspense with a random name picker
> Keep things on track with a nifty timer
> Say goodbye to app-hopping with in-app online searches
> Shine the spotlight with star awards

Session Desciption: Enhance your teaching skills with a practical template and essential theoretical knowledge to seamlessly integrate ICT into your lesson plans and engage your students.
Session Outcomes:
- Discuss the concept of E-Learning as an Add-in, not an Add-on
- Understand how the TPACK Model may be used to do self-evaluation
- How we can use the SAMR Model to evaluate and enhance teaching practice
- Explaining how we can use a Digital Lesson Plan template to improve

Session Name: AI In Education: Work Smarter, not Harder
Session Desciption: Explore the fundamentals of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in education. Learn how AI tools and technologies can streamline administrative tasks and empower educators to focus more on personalized teaching.
Session Outcomes:
> Understand the basic concepts of AI and its relevance in education.
> Understand the shifting landscape of 21st-century education
> Discover AI-powered tools to enhance efficiency of administrative and other teaching tasks.
> Explore strategies to integrate AI into daily teaching practices, enhancing productivity and time management.

Session Desciption: Discover how to effectively incorporate videos into your teaching practice, grounded in solid pedagogy, and learn practical tips to simplify the process and enhance student engagement.
Session Outcomes:
>> Understanding videos as supplement, not replacement

>> Different video lengths for different ages
○ Trimming / snipping videos

YouTube
○ Beware the Algorithm!
○ YouTube downloads and playlists.

Google Slides and YouTube
○ Adding Youtube videos to Slides
○ Resizing, trimming and editing around a Youtube video in Slides.

Basic Video Editing with ClipChamp
○ Cropping/splitting and trimming
○ Recording in ClipChamp
○ Adding annotations

Session Desciption: Uncover the power of digital tools in formative assessment, exploring two innovative solutions that don't require learner devices, revolutionizing feedback and student growth!
Session Outcomes:
In this session you will explore the following:
> The value of using digital tools for Formative Assessment.
> How digital tools can close the feedback loop of Formative Assessment.
> An extensive exploration of using Quizizz with printed codes.
> An extensive exploration of using SwiftGrade

Session Desciption: Discover how Wayground transforms Assessment FOR Learning, making it engaging, interactive, and data-driven, enhancing student outcomes and informing teaching practices.
Session Outcomes:
This workshop will be demonstrative and practical while it explores the following:
> Create a Quizizz from scratch
> Create a Quizizz by "teleporting" questions
> Creating a Class in Quizizz
> Linking Google Classroom to Quizizz
> Playing a Quizizz
> Analysing results in Quizizz
> Using the Homework mode to extend learning (multiple tries etc)
> Mention the Quizizz AI Chrome Extension

Session Name: Tech Hour: PowerPoint tips and tricks for creative design
Session Desciption: Discover expert tips and tricks to streamline your PowerPoint slide creation, making your presentations engaging, visually appealing, and effective in conveying your message.
Session Outcomes:
This workshop will be demonstrative while it explores the following:
> Formatting and manipulation of: 
• shapes/images
• sound
> Insert
• ink equation
• smart art
• shapes/images,
> Transition
• morph
> Slide Show and Presentation
• Recording
• Zoom
> Remove background
> Recover files
> Smart look up

Session Name: Ease of Access with QR Codes and Bit.ly links
Session Desciption: The purpose of the workshop is to explore QR codes and link shorteners to help teachers understand how to improve the ease of access to digital content.
Session Outcomes:
This workshop will be demonstrative and practical while it explores the following:
General introduction to what Ease of Access refers to
Introduction to what is meant by Ease of Access
○ Device consideration

Dynamic vs Static content
○ Locally-hosted file vs cloud-based file
○ Dynamic (changeable) vs static (unchangeable)

QR Codes and Link Shorteners
○ QR Codes: What, when and recommendations.
○ Link shorteners and What, when and recommendations

HyperDocs
○ Understanding what HyperDocs are
○ Making a HyperDoc

>>  Add sections to the form
>>  Add collaborators

Session Name: Digital Puzzles for Primary School Learning
Session Desciption: Experience Digipuzzle.net, a dynamic platform that brings game-based learning to life in your classroom! Perfect for primary school teachers, especially foundation phase, to engage young minds and make learning a thrilling adventure!
Session Outcomes:
This workshop will be demonstrative while it explores the following:The pedagogy underlying using game-base learning.
• Explore the benefits of game-based learning for younger learners in developing ""soft"" digital skills
• Digipuzzle.net will be used an example of game-based learning for younger learners.
• Explore different examples found with digipuzzle.net
• Discuss and explore different integration methodologies (as class / as individual / group work)
• Explore mobile device ease of use
• Sharing activities via Google Classroom / Whatsapp etc.
• EXTRA: Using Ublock Origin to stop the Advertisements"

Session Desciption: Discover Book Creator and learn how to craft engaging digital storybooks that inspire students!
Session Outcomes:
This workshop will be demonstrative and practical while it explores the following:
  
 Practical application of the Book Creator tool
 Set up book creator account 
 Work with text, images, audio, video, shapes
 Create, Publish and Share book
 Practical application after each section so that at the end of the session participant have created their first book

Session Name: Foundation Phase EdTech Tools for Numeracy
Session Desciption: Explore how EdTech tools can support the acquisition and practice of numeracy skills in the Foundation Phase. The tools to be explored are Top Marks, Toy Theatre, 6Bricks and Blooket.
Session Outcomes:
This session aims to achieve the following outcomes:
> Understand the importance of pre-loading digital tools.
> Understand how TopMarks could be integrated to enhance numeracy skills in FP.
> Understand how Toy Theater could be integrated to enhance numeracy skills in FP.
> Understand how 6Bricks could be integrated to enhance numeracy skills in FP.
> Understand how Blooket could be integrated to enhance numeracy skills in FP.

Session Name: Foundation Phase EdTech Tools for Reading
Session Desciption: Discover how EdTech tools can be applied in a rotational model in a foundation phase classroom. The tools we'll look at are JollyPhonics, Bookcreator and Canva.
Session Outcomes:
This session aims to achieve the following outcomes:
> Understand what a rotational model is in a foundation phase setting.
> Understand how digital tools can be used to support the rotational model.
> Have a brief overview of how the JollyPhonics app is used in the rotational model.
> Have a brief overview of how Bookcreator is used in the rotational model.
> Have a brief overview of how Canva is used in the rotational model.

General introduction to what Ease of Access refers to
Introduction to what is meant by Ease of Access

Dynamic vs Static content

QR Codes and Link Shorteners

○ Link shorteners and What, when and recommendations

HyperDocs
○ Understanding what HyperDocs are
○ Making a HyperDoc

Session Desciption: Enhance your digital presentation skills, from fundamentals to advanced techniques, in this engaging session designed for educators of all ICT proficiency levels, ensuring engaging and effective teaching.
Session Outcomes:
>  Cognitive Overload
How to ensure that our presentations have the maximum impact on learning by avoiding overloading presentations.

>>  Aesthetic value 
Understanding the balance of style and substance with presentations. How we can make things look good, but avoid our message being lost.

>>  Maximising screen real estate
Using as much of the screen for your presentations, whether working in PowerPoint, Word or PDFs

>>  Adding annotations on websites/desktop
How can we add annotations on our screens on any Window or on any Website.

• Discuss and explore different integration methodologies (as class / as individual / group work)
• Explore mobile device ease of use
• Sharing activities via Google Classroom / Whatsapp etc.
• EXTRA: Using Ublock Origin to stop the Advertisements"

Session Desciption: Unlock the full potential of datasheets! Learn to efficiently manipulate, automate, and safeguard data, streamlining workflows and informing data-driven decisions in this empowering workshop.
Session Outcomes:
This workshop will be demonstrative and practical to extend communication beyond the classroom while it explores the following:
•        Basic Data management tips
•        Matching Data
•        Selecting and sorting data (QUERY)
•        Controlling Input in Sheets
•        Special Conditional Formatting
•        Protecting your sheet
•        Q & A

Session Name: Foundation Phase EdTech Tools for Reading
Session Desciption: Discover how EdTech tools can be applied in a rotational model in a foundation phase classroom. The tools we'll look at are JollyPhonics, Bookcreator and Canva.
Session Outcomes:
This session aims to achieve the following outcomes:
> Understand what a rotational model is in a foundation phase setting.
> Understand how digital tools can be used to support the rotational model.
> Have a brief overview of how the JollyPhonics app is used in the rotational model.
> Have a brief overview of how Bookcreator is used in the rotational model.
> Have a brief overview of how Canva is used in the rotational model.
